Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Peptide 1 (AI Predicted AMPs, Arg-rich, XXA, UCLl1c)
Sequence Information.Source: AI predicted, Derived from UniProt ID: Q504U8, human protein

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (44.44%) to[RLLR]5R: 29%, L: 21%, I: 13%.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 1.6 uM), P. aeruginosa (MIC 0.2 uM), A. baumannii (MIC 0.2 uM), S. enterica (MIC 6 uM), S. aureus (MIC 1.6 uM), E. faecium (MIC 13 uM), and M. luteus (MIC 0.8 uM).In vitro toxicity:  horse RBC: 37% hemolysis at 150 uM (HC 50> 100 uM), less hemo.lytic. HepG2 cell (IC50 64 uM).Structure:  random coil in water and helical in 1-10 mM SDS.
Literature Information.Author: Ramos-Llorens M, Bello-Madruga R, Valle J, Andreu D, Torrent M. 2024
Literature Information.Title: PyAMPA: a high-throughput prediction and optimization tool for antimicrobial peptides.
